thread.title: With Kam Chancellor Legion of Boom is Whole
thread.title_full: With Kam Chancellor Legion of Boom is Whole

title: With Kam Chancellor Legion of Boom is Whole
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
7 Oct 2015 07:39 AM EST 
After a 54-day holdout and 58 minutes of football, Kam Chancellor opened contract negotiations for a big bonus on Monday night. In a single play with one well-placed punch he saved victory from the clutches of defeat and proved how pivotal his presence on the Seattle Seahawks defense is. At the end of Monday Night Football in the tumultuous and tense seconds that seem to slow before a touchdown, Chancellor flew into the camera frame for those watching at home leading with his right fist, knocking the ball loose from Calvin Johnson's grasp. The play maintained their 13-to-10 lead over the Detroit Lions. Though he's not the man in Seattle as the Legion of Boom is just that, legion; it is whole again.
